product_name: BIC Sport Air Allround Inflatable Stand Up Paddle Board - 10'
long_description: If your vacation plans include travel and water activities, this is the paddle board for you. It's compact enough to fit in your car's trunk but offers performance you'd expect from a composite board.
short_description: If your vacation plans include travel and water activities, this is the paddle board for you. It's compact enough to fit in your car's trunk but offers performance you'd expect from a composite board.
